generic: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.name: Modifications dans les sources
obligations.verbatim:
2. Altered source versions must be plainly marked as such, and must not be misrepresented as
being the original software.

generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: Mention du copyright dans la doc
obligations.verbatim:
1. The origin of this software must not be misrepresented; you must not claim that you wrote the
original software. If you use this software in a product, an acknowledgment (see the following)
in the product documentation is required.

Portions Copyright (c) 2002-2007 Charlie Poole or Copyright (c) 2002-2004 James W. Newkirk,
Michael C. Two, Alexei A. Vorontsov or Copyright (c) 2000-2002 Philip A. Craig

generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Conserver la licence dans les sources
obligations.verbatim: 3. This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution.
